PROJECTS 
 
 
1. Pureminutes: 
 
Role 
: Coding, Development, Implementation. 
Skills Used 
: Vb.net, API integration, DB communication 
 
Description: 
 
                www.pureminutes.com site enables the user to make international call much easier with low rates. This site enable 
the Guest user to get registered with www.pureminutes.com .Enable them to make recharge. Allow the registered user to avail 
extra feature of speed dial feature and Refer and Earn credit. The Auto recharge process facility make to user to enjoy services 
without disconnection. 
 
 

Responsibilities: 
 
● 
User Creation with Pin generation and with needed security access 
● 
SMS API integration 
● 
Credit Card Payment through Authorize.net CIM 
● 
Speed dial with Logic of getting nearest access number allocation 
● 
Report creation using SSRS 
 
2. PaymentGateway Integration: 
 
Role 
 
 
: Development, Implementation and Manual Testing. 
Skills Used 
 
: Authorize.net CIM API, ASMX web service call 
 
Description: 
 
                               This web service allows the guest users of pure minute’s website to make recharge through the Mobile 
Applications. Authorize.net CIM integration helps to manage the users and Credit Card Information .This Web service Provides 
ability of their account/payment information management.  
 
Responsibilities 
 
● 
Credit Card Payment through Authorize.net CIM 
● 
SMS API integration for the each recharge status with the updated balance information to the customer.

: Development, Implementation and Manual Testing.

about the Agent/User balance and activity.

Role 
 
 
: Development, Implementation and Manual Testing. 
Skills Used

the User/Agent Auto recharge functionality.Autorecharge schedulers will be enabled once in 15 minutes to fill account which 
falls below $3 will be recharged with specified amount using Credit card payment. 
SQL jobs have been implemented with appropriate stored procedures which calculate Invoice and Weekly statement of 
branches under their company.  
 
 Responsibilities: 
 
● Created the console application that can handle the automatic recharge.  
● Created a schedule in windows scheduler and in SQLJOBS
